title: Eames Lounge Chair
description: An iconic mid-century piece in restored Palisander rosewood and black leather. A statement of comfort and luxury.

title: Danish Teak Credenza
description: A beautiful 1960s credenza with tambour doors and sculpted pulls. Perfect for storage and display.

title: Art Deco Brass Mirror
description: A stunning, sunburst-style brass mirror from the 1930s. Adds a touch of glamour to any wall.

title: Wassily Chair
description: A Model B3 chair, designed by Marcel Breuer. A revolutionary piece made of chromed steel and leather.

title: Serge Mouille Floor Lamp
description: An elegant three-arm rotating floor lamp, offering both direct and ambient light with sculptural grace.

title: Abstract Expressionist Painting
description: A vibrant, large-scale abstract oil on canvas from the 1950s. Artist unknown, energy undeniable.
